flawed_nl_solution:
The first sister has 5 pieces of clothing because 10 / 2 = <<10/2=5>>5
The next sister had 21 pieces of clothing because 10 + 2 = <<10+2=21>>21
The three youngest sisters combined have 36 pieces because 10 + 5 + 21 = <<10+5+21=36>>36
The oldest has 12 pieces because 36 / 3 = <<36/3=12>>12
Nicole ends up with 48 pieces of clothing because 10 + 5 + 21 + 12 = <<10+5+21+12=48>>48
#### 48

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
